Body:
Description: Hi Team,

Good day!!

we deployed the forest domain for the first time and it was successful but we are seeing some issues on the PingCastle Console

It would be great if we could connect tomorrow for a call for 10 minutes.

Looking forwad!!


Thanks,
Akhil
What We've Learned Updated: after assigning the apis to the entities, re-running the scan should fix the issue
Next Steps Updated: escalated to vincent, as issue persists

Steps to Reproduce Updated: setting up APIs
running reports

Description Updated: Client with multiple domains set up APIs for the reports, but the forest for four domains is not displaying correctly. Only one child domain is connected to the parent, while the other domains have no parent domain.
What We've Learned Updated: The client was guided to assign the correct entities and re-run the scans, but the issue persists.
issue has been shared with vincent, awaiting his expertise
